api_list.api_description: Get a list of any unresolved incidents on DigitalOcean.
Retrieve information about a specific host from URLhaus.

required_parameters.name: host
required_parameters.description: The host to query (IPv4 address, hostname, or domain name).

query: Can you identify any unresolved incidents for DigitalOcean and also provide information about the host example.com from URLhaus?
